config.title: AI Translate Configuration
config.largeModelApi.desc: Large model API address (defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1 in OpenAI mode)
config.largeModelMaxTokens.desc: Maximum number of tokens for the large model (only effective in OpenAI mode)
config.largeModelTemperature.desc: Large model temperature parameter (only effective in OpenAI mode)
config.namingRules.default: Example: Automatically determined by AI based on the language pattern
config.aiTranslate.customTranslatePrompt: Custom translation prompt, must include `${targetLang}` and `${content}` parameters
config.aiTranslate.customNamingPrompt: Custom naming prompt, must include `${variableName}`, `${paragraph}`, and `${languageId}` parameters
config.aiTranslate.streaming: Enable streaming (only effective in OpenAI mode)
